FuncDef: The reset qppb local-policy statistics interface command clears statistics about a QPPB local policy on a specified interface.
CLIs: reset qppb local-policy statistics interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } [ qos-local-id <qos-local-id> ] { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the QoS local ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Clears statistics about a QPPB local policy in the inbound direction.
-

Clears statistics about a QPPB local policy in the outbound direction.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset qppb local-policy statistics interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0 inbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used to clear statistics about a QPPB local policy on a specified interface.
